byline.original: By VINCENT SHEEAN North American Newspaper Alliance

abstract: Dispatches on: Brit pub reaction to bombings
snippet: LONDON, Sept. 1--Dover's shooting affrays, both yesterday and today have provided one of the most curious episodes in this war....

headline.main: MORALE OF BRITISH FIRM UNDER RAIDS; People Show No Indication of Cracking From Strain of Repeated Air Attacks DAMAGE NOT REALLY VITAL Invasion Has Apparently Been Put Off and Some Hold That It is Now Unlikely

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 1--Dover's shooting affrays, both yesterday and today have provided one of the most curious episodes in this war.
